text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā ga shimo peta chi ni atae rareta, kare kara no (tamamono) ya, shokuryō to shite (ataerareta) seijōna mono o, dare ga kinjita no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Korera no mono wa, gense no shinkō suru mono-tachi no tame no monodeari, tokuni shinpan no hi ni wa kanzen ni shinja no sen'yū suru mono to naru.' Ware wa kono yō ni shirushi o, rikai aru hitobito ni kaimei suru
